item.title: Adding objects for Dodian source?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Lol delete one of those NewObjects(); in your case 121.

and make your 2nd void like this:

public void NewObjects() { makeGlobalObject(1111, 2222, 3333, 0, 10); }

Which means the object # 3333, will be on xcoord 1111, ycoord 2222, and it will face west. (the 0)

Read full topic

item.title: Adding objects for Dodian source?
item.dc:creator: @BORED BORED
item.description:
@BORED wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:172322"]Ok… again

Add these voids

[code]public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}

public void NewObjects() {
makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10);
}[/code]

the last “MakeGlobalObect”, change that.

Now search for:

case 121

and add this:

			NewObjects();

Where he need put that, the last "MakeGlobalObect", change that. lol,"MakeGlobalObect’’ What he need to chang or delete it ,R0FL.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding objects for Dodian source?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

client.java:516: NewObjects() is already defined in client
public void NewObjects() {
^
client.java:467: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable xcoord
location: class client
makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10);
^
client.java:467: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable ycoord
location: class client
makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10);
^
client.java:467: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable objectid
location: class client
makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10);
^
Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
4 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

Then you do it for me. Cause I am fucked without it. I need to be able to add objects.

item.title: Adding objects for Dodian source?
item.dc:creator: @Runer_King Runer King
item.description:
@Runer_King wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:4, topic:172322"]Ok… again

Add these voids

[code]public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);}}}}}

public void NewObjects() {
makeGlobalObject(xcoord, ycoord, objectid, 0, 10);
}[/code]

the last “MakeGlobalObect”, change that.

Now search for:

case 121

and add this:

			NewObjects();

Dude, last time, it gave errors. Idk if this works for Devolution 7.
